A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: None of the characters do anything worthwhile\, most of them could've been easily cut from the movie w/o any impact to the final outcome. An entire sequence (and a few other moments) in the movie feels like it was lifted right out of the prequels. Plot holes so large the death star could glide right through. Maybe this could be recut into a film of half the length that would be alright. Sad day for Star Wars.
